fullDescription.intro: This layer applies global max pooling in a single dimension. Corresponds to the Keras Global Max Pooling 1D Layer.
fullDescription.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Global Max Pooling 1D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Global Max Pooling 1D layer.
